contents.text: Welcome to Triplebyte in San Francisco, where you can take our coding quiz and receive offers from top tech companies.
If you are a software engineer looking to take our coding quiz and get matched with leading tech companies, press 1.
To start your coding quiz now, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a quiz specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m ready to start my coding quiz right away
I want to start my Triplebyte coding quiz to help me transition into a software engineering role.
Initiate the Triplebyte coding assessment to benchmark my software engineering skills.
I need help starting the coding quiz.
I’d like to begin my Triplebyte coding quiz so I can demonstrate my software engineering skills and get matched with top tech firms.

contents.text: For questions about an existing quiz or your application status, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to candidate support.

navigationGoals: I’d like an update on my current quiz application status
I need to follow up on my submitted coding quiz and check my application status.
Check on my existing coding quiz outcomes and application status.
I want to check on the status of my quiz application.
I need an update on my coding quiz results and application status after completing the assessment.

contents.text: If you are a hiring manager interested in our B2B recruitment services, press 2.
To speak with our enterprise sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an enterprise sales representative.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with sales about using Triplebyte for our tech hiring
As a veteran now in a hiring manager role, I’d like to discuss enterprise sales options for recruiting engineers.
Connect with your enterprise sales team about B2B tech recruitment services.
I'd like to speak with someone about recruitment services for hiring.
I want to discuss enterprise recruitment options to hire lab assistants for my physics research group.

contents.text: For customer support or technical assistance with our platform, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to customer support.

navigationGoals: I need assistance troubleshooting the hiring platform
I have a technical issue with my recruiter account and need customer support to resolve it.
Get technical support for integrating Triplebyte platform into our ATS.
I'm having technical trouble with the platform and need assistance.
I’m having trouble accessing the enterprise platform dashboard for candidate management and need customer support.
